Commission is, therefore, facing immense difficulty in disposing of higher numbers
of such complaints, petitions or appeals etc. through a single bench. Hence, the
instant amendment is necessary to take immediate action to facilitate the Commission
for constitution of more benches to effectively dispose of such complaints, petitions
or appeals etc.;

I . Short title and commencement.- ( I ) This Ordinance may be called
the Elections (Amendment) Ordinance, 201 8.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
2. Amendment of section 6, Act XXXII of 2017.- In the Elections
